metadata.title: CVE-2022-48745 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Certified (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:net/mlx5: Use del_timer_sync in fw reset flow of halting poll Substitutedel_timer() with del_timer_sync() in fw reset polling deactivation flow, inorder to prevent a race condition which occurs when del_timer() is calledand timer is deactivated while another process is handling the timerinterrupt. A situation that led to the following call trace: RIP:0010:run_timer_softirq+0x137/0x420 <IRQ> recalibrate_cpu_khz+0x10/0x10ktime_get+0x3e/0xa0 ? sched_clock_cpu+0xb/0xc0 __do_softirq+0xf5/0x2eairq_exit_rcu+0xc1/0xf0 sysvec_apic_timer_interrupt+0x9e/0xc0asm_sysvec_apic_timer_interrupt+0x12/0x20 </IRQ>

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips/xenial is affected and may need fixing.
